caption:
This photograph captures an elderly couple standing side-by-side in what appears to be a living room. The woman on the left wears a floral patterned blouse and has her gray hair styled short. The man on the right has thinning white hair and is wearing a light blue button-up shirt, held up by suspenders.

Both are standing next to a piece of medical equipment that seems to be an old-fashioned respiratory assistance device, possibly an oxygen concentrator or ventilator. This device includes a metal frame on wheels, tubes, and a box-shaped mechanism with dials and switches. The man holds something connected to the device, perhaps a control or a part of the respiratory apparatus.

The living room setting is furnished with a floral patterned carpet and traditional decor. In the background, the walls are adorned with various framed certificates and there appears to be a small piece of furniture like a console table. The color tones throughout the room, along with the choice of furniture and decor, suggest a time-setting from the mid-20th century. The photograph itself has a grainy texture typical of film cameras used during that period.
title: Robert B. Jones, retired worker, is totally dependent on his home oxygen machine for survival. (From the sites exhibition. For other images in this assignment, see fiche numbers 49, 50, 51, 52.)
